org.forgerock.openam.scripting.factories

Class RhinoScriptEngineFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.forgerock.openam.scripting.factories.RhinoScriptEngineFactory
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ScriptEngineFactory

    public class RhinoScriptEngineFactory
extends Object
implements ScriptEngineFactory
    JSR-223 wrapper around a Rhino ContextFactory. Uses the configured ContextFactory to compile and evaluate scripts and so does not require use of the global context factory.
    See Also:
    JSR-223: Scripting for the Java Platform

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int INTERPRETED
      Optimisation level constant indicating that scripts should be fully interpreted and not compiled.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      RhinoScriptEngineFactory()
      Constructs the script engine factory with a fresh context factory and no class-shutter.
      RhinoScriptEngineFactory(org.mozilla.javascript.ContextFactory contextFactory)
      Constructs a script engine factory using the given context factory and class-shutter.

    • Field Detail

      • INTERPRETED

        public static final int INTERPRETED
        Optimisation level constant indicating that scripts should be fully interpreted and not compiled.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

    • Constructor Detail

      • RhinoScriptEngineFactory

        public RhinoScriptEngineFactory(org.mozilla.javascript.ContextFactory contextFactory)
        Constructs a script engine factory using the given context factory and class-shutter. If non-null, the given class-shutter will be applied to all context objects created by this script engine factory, providing a means of sandboxing scripts. This constructor will interrogate the given context factory to determine the implementation and language version provided.
        Parameters:
        contextFactory - the Rhino context factory. May not be null.

      • RhinoScriptEngineFactory

        public RhinoScriptEngineFactory()
        Constructs the script engine factory with a fresh context factory and no class-shutter.
        See Also:
        RhinoScriptEngineFactory(org.mozilla.javascript.ContextFactory)

      • setOptimisationLevel

        public void setOptimisationLevel(int optimisationLevel)
        Sets the optimisation level to use for context objects created by this script engine. Use INTERPRETED to disable all optimisations and use a purely interpreted script engine.
        Parameters:
        optimisationLevel - the optimisation level to use.

      • setClassShutter

        public void setClassShutter(org.mozilla.javascript.ClassShutter classShutter)
        Sets the class shutter to be used to sandbox scripts running in this engine.
        Parameters:
        classShutter - the class-shutter to use. May be null to disable sandboxing.
